section.paragraph_1: In this page you can download the official Parrot builds for embedded ARM boards and other custom builds of Parrot for other special platforms.
section.paragraph_2: The official ARM builds in this page are official images released by our ARM team.
section.paragraph_3: Here you can also find custom Parrot derivatives and experimental builds with custom configurations for special devices, or just experimental Parrot derivatives proposed by our community and built on our official build platform.
